intro: Palicourea denslowiae, commonly known as the denseflowered palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dense clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Palicourea denslowiae is often found in shaded, moist environments within tropical forests.
